data.title: All 118 Sean Penn Movies (in Order)
data.meta_description: Dive into the world of award-winning actor Sean Penn as we take a look at some of his most memorable movies throughout his illustrious career. From heart-wrenching dramas to action-packed thrillersâ€¦
data.text:
Amy Collier

Â·

Follow

45 min read

Â·

Mar 17, 2024

--

Dive into the world of award-winning actor Sean Penn as we take a look at some of his most memorable movies throughout his illustrious career. From heart-wrenching dramas to action-packed thrillers, this roundup will give you a taste of the diverse roles that have solidified Pennâ€™s status as a Hollywood legend.

1. Taps (1981)

Tapsâ€ is a captivating drama from 1981, following a group of military cadets as they fight to protect the future of their academy. When their prestigious institution faces potential demolition at the hands of local condo developers, these dedicated students take extreme measures to preserve their beloved academy.
